attributes.action: Make it illegal for full records of who had and who used taxpayer funded credit cards to be destroyed
attributes.additional_details: There is increasing evidence that credit card holders are defrauding and stealing from the taxpayer - such activity being condoned and nurtured by our present government - by using their taxpayer funded credit cards to make personal purchases.  In the very near future this country will sink into revolution and the revolution committee will wish to recover all monies misused by civil servants under this government and put them before the courts for that fraud and theft.
